name: Dreams Of Samus
description:
A quickly made adventure platformer  with authentic GameBoy music which i made with LSDJ + SuperGameboy. (The Stagetrack is not authentic though due to time ending before uploading).

The story? Its about my cat Samus!

#HOW TO PLAY#

Movement = WASD
Jump = L
Run = J
Esc = End Game
TAB = Switch between fullscreen and normal
CONTROL = Restart game

@2019
@Kimmsoft
